name: CHIKMAGALORE MULTI PURPOSE SOCIAL SERVICE SOCIETY
briefDescription: The Chikmagalur Multipurpose Social Service Society (CMSSS) was registered under Karnataka Societies Registration Act, 1960 in July, 1978. It is a voluntary, non-profitable organization aimed at carrying out various developmental activities irrespective of Caste, Creed and Religion to enable the underprivileged people to avail all possible help so as to improve their living conditions.The organization is working with the target group of socially, economically poor women and children in particular; including persons with disability and unemployed youth.
